suggestions.label: Accountable
suggestions.text: Hagh dari. cancel kardan-e last minute dorost nabood. az in be bad age ehtemal-e taghir bashe zoodtar behet migam ta stress nagiri.
suggestions.why_it_works: Validates their feeling and commits to a concrete change.

suggestions.label: Short
suggestions.text: Hagh dari. az in be bad zoodtar khabar midam üôè

suggestions.label: Collaborative
suggestions.text: Kamelan mifahmam. doost daram ye rule bezarim: age ta felan saat ghat'i naboodam, haman moghe behet begam ke to ham betooni barname-rizi koni. ok-e?
suggestions.why_it_works: Turns it into a shared plan.
